name: MLG Platformer
description:
Dang this took a while...

But anyway, this is pretty much the maximum of what I can do with the free version of construct, so enjoy!

Things to note:

If you want to reset the rings, the "reset progress" button doesn't do that, it only resets the level progress. To reset the rings, just reload the page.

Also, the sound button works, but if you set it to mute, it only mutes the music, and also, if you die, it will automatically turn the music on again. Sorry about that, but I can't do anything about it.
